article.title: Raytheon Awarded Contract for ONR's Free Electron Laser Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Office of Naval Research (ONR) has awarded Raytheon Company a 12-month contract to develop the preliminary design of a 100 kilowatt experimental Free Electron Laser for the U.S. Navy. This preliminary design is the first of a three-phase ONR Innovative Naval Prototype program worth more than $150 million.
